Distribution in Iran .
Alborz , Ardabil , Fars , Isfahan , Kerman , Kordestan , Lorestan , Tehran , West Azarbaijan ( Modarres Awal 1997 ), Zanjan ( Mirzayans 1970 ; Modarres Awal 1997 ).

General distribution. Armenia, Azerbaijan, Bulgaria, Georgia, Greece,
Russia ( South European Territory ), Krym
, Iran, Israel, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Syria, Turkey (
Gerstmeier et al . 1999
; Löbl & Smetana 2007 ).
